tasks.label: backend
tasks.command: cd backend; if (!(Test-Path .venv)) { python -m venv .venv }; .\.venv\Scripts\python.exe -m pip install -r requirements.txt; .\.venv\Scripts\python.exe -m uvicorn app.main:app --host 127.0.0.1 --port 8000 --reload

tasks.label: frontend
tasks.command: cd frontend; if (!(Test-Path node_modules)) { npm install }; npm run dev
